ETYMOLOGY: From Old English eahtoða, formed from eight and the ordinal suffix -th.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Coming after the seventh in a sequence or series.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 顺序排列在第七之后；在系列或顺序中是第八个的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The concert on the eighth of May was postponed.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 五月八日的音乐会被推迟了。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: One of eight equal parts into which something is divided; one eighth (1/8).
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 八分之一；整体被分成八等份中的一份。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He ate nearly an eighth of the cake himself.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他自己吃掉了几乎八分之一的蛋糕。
